Class CorePlayerAccount

public class CorePlayerAccount extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CorePlayerAccount​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
    An instance of a core player account, generated upon first login and saved to a local file.

  • Constructor Details

    • CorePlayerAccount

      public CorePlayerAccount​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      An instance of a core player account, generated upon first login and saved to a local file.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • enableAutoLogin

      public void enableAutoLogin​(org.bukkit.entity.Player target, String username, String password_hashed)
      Enables automatic login for this account.
      Parameters:
      target - The player to target
      username - The username to the secure account for autologin
      password_hashed - The hashed password to the secure account

    • disableAutoLogin

      public void disableAutoLogin()
      Disables automatic login for this account.

    • isAutoLogin

      public boolean isAutoLogin()
      Gets if this account has automatic login enabled.
      Returns:
      This account's autologin status.

    • getAutologinKey

      public int getAutologinKey()
      Gets this account's autologin key.
      Returns:
      The autologin key associated with this account.

    • getAutologinUsername

      public String getAutologinUsername()
      Gets this account's autologin account username.
      Returns:
      The account name to autologin to.

    • getExpectedIP

      public String getExpectedIP()
      Gets the expected IP for the player who owns this account.

      If the expected IP and connected IP don't match, automatic login will be cancelled and disabled for this account.

      Returns:
      This account's expected IP
